message.original: 錬金の証 アルケミスト戦術試練
アルケミストの基本戦術を学ぶため 修練の祠にて試練に挑む
message.translation: In order to learn the basic tactics of Alchemist, challenge the trial of the Training Chapel

message.original: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
message.translation: Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel

message.original: アルケムで錬成物質を付着させ、敵の注意を引け
message.translation: Attach alchemical stakes to an enemy with Alchemy, and draw their attention.

message.original: クラスターで錬成物質を付着させ、敵の注意を引け
message.translation: Attach alchemical stakes to an enemy using Cluster, and draw their attention.

message.original: 錬成物質をさらに付着させ、より敵の注意を引け
message.translation: Amplify the alchemical stakes by attacking them more, and draw more enemy attention.

message.original: アルケム・フーガで敵の攻撃を避けろ
message.translation: Avoid an enemy attack with Alchemical Fuga

message.original: 錬成物質を敵に2体以上付着させよ
message.translation: Attach two masses of alchemical stakes to the enemy.

message.original: 敵に付着した錬成物質をエリクシルで解放せよ
message.translation: Unleash the power of the alchemical stakes on the enemy with Elixir.

message.original: 最奥の敵にしがみつきコンクラスターで攻撃せよ
message.translation: Cling to the enemy in the deeper chamber and attack them with Concluster.

message.original: 最奥にある＜錬金の証＞を入手する
message.translation: Collect the proof of completing the trial

message.original: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
